@dev emitted when a member leaves the community
 @param _member the user which just left the community*

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The currency passed as an argument is not enabled, sorry!"

arguments.value: The currency passed as an argument is not enabled, sorry!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The currency passed as an argument is not enabled, sorry!"

documentation.text:
@dev makes the calling user join the community if required conditions are met
 @param _amountOfDITOToRedeem the amount of dito tokens for which this user is eligible*
@dev makes the calling user leave the community if required conditions are met*

devdoc.author: DistributedTown
devdoc.details: Implementation of the Community concept in the scope of the DistributedTown project

MemberAdded(address,uint256).details: emitted when a member is added

params._member: the user which just joined the community
params._transferredTokens: the amount of transferred dito tokens on join*

MemberRemoved(address).details: emitted when a member leaves the community

params._member: the user which just left the community*

deposit(uint256,string,bytes).details: makes the calling user deposit funds in the community if required conditions are met

params._amount: number of currency which the user wants to deposit
params._currency: currency the user wants to deposit (as of now only DAI and USDC)
params._optionalSignatureInfo: abiEncoded data in order to make USDC2 gasless transactions*

getInvestedBalanceInfo().details: Returns the balance invested by the contract in Aave (invested + interest) and the APY

returns.investedBalance: the aDai balance of the contract
returns.investedTokenAPY: the median APY of invested balance*

invest(uint256,string).details: makes the calling user lend funds that are in the community contract into Aave if required conditions are met

params._amount: number of currency which the user wants to lend
params._currency: currency the user wants to deposit (as of now only DAI)*

join(uint256).details: makes the calling user join the community if required conditions are met

params._amountOfDITOToRedeem: the amount of dito tokens for which this user is eligible*

leave().details: makes the calling user leave the community if required conditions are met*

withdrawFromInvestment(uint256,string).details: makes the calling user withdraw funds that are in Aave back into the community contract if required conditions are met

params._amount: amount of currency which the user wants to withdraw
params._currency: currency the user wants to deposit (as of now only DAI)*

devdoc.title: DistributedTown Community
